hero.title: Gushimangira Afurika binyuze mu Ubumenyi bw'Ikoranabuhanga
hero.subtitle: Ibigo by'Ikoranabuhanga Bigendanwa bikoresha Ingufu z'Iziko
hero.description: Kuzana ubumenyi bw'ikoranabuhanga, ubwiyunge bw'ubuzima, n'amakuru yemejwe mu miryango idafite serivisi zihagije muri Afurika yose binyuze mu bigo by'ubwiyunge bishya.

about.title: Ibigo by'Ikoranabuhanga Bigendanwa Bishya
about.subtitle: Ibikoresho by'ubucuruzi bikoresha ingufu z'iziko bihinduwe ibigo by'ikoranabuhanga
about.description: Uburyo bwacu bushya buzana ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu miryango ya kure binyuze mu bidukikije by'ubwiyunge bigendanwa, birambye, kandi bihuza n'umuco.

countries.title: Uko Tubayeho muri Afurika
countries.subtitle: Gahunda zihuza n'ibikenewe by'uko buri muryango

curriculum.title: Amahugurwa Yuzuye y'Ubumenyi bw'Ikoranabuhanga
curriculum.subtitle: Kuva ku bumenyi bw'ibanze kugeza ku bumenyi bw'ikoranabuhanga bwo hejuru

stories.title: Guhindura Ubuzima, Inkuru Imwe mu Gihe
stories.subtitle: Ingaruka nyazo ziva ku bantu nyabo

footer.description: Gushimangira imitwe y'Abanyafurika binyuze mu burezi bw'ikoranabuhanga bushya n'ibisubizo by'ikoranabuhanga birambye.
